posts.post_title: n28 King Kelly PSA 5 (MK) for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jimi
Just curious to see what kind of offers I can get for my PSA 5 (MK) King Kelly 1887 N28.  I'm looking to get an SGC graded one with no markings on it so that's why I am selling this one.  Basically, it's a great looking card (I can send scan upon request), but someone used the back as a checklist in pencil.  No real super hard marks, but some light to medium.  Let me know if interested!

jimivintage@yahoo.com

Jimi
